bug.description:
Describe the bug When I am training a language model in aws server and loading it from checkpoint from time to time, its working properly, But when I am trying to load a checkpoint(made in an aws server) in google colab, it gives me a Path doesn't exist assertion error. Same is the case other way around. To Reproduce
Train a model locally(or in an server) Upload the code and checkpoints in google drive Mount google drive in a colab notebook Load the model from checkpoint and try training the model
Expected behavior Successful loading and training of the model

OS : Ubuntu 16.04.6(of aws server) Version: 0.4.1(in both the cases)
